Package edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.router

package edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.router
This package contains a basic router and structure to help users build routers of their own.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractRouter
     
    BasicRouter
    This router is a brute force maze router.
    Node
    This class represents the basic routing element, a node or wire.
    NodeFactory<N extends Node>
     
    PinSorter
    This class is used by the StaticSourceHandler to sort pins based on how they should be allocated for TIEOFFs.
    StaticSourceHandler
    This class separates the static nets in to separate nets so they can be routed more easily by the router.
    V4PinSorter
     
    V5PinSorter
